author: cms-sw
body:
This adds a new tests for Pull requests testing. Tests make use of `runTheMatrix.py --maxStep=0` option to run all das query steps. This should catch if there is any new data being access which is not yet known to DAS.

The extra test should not take more than 8-10 mins to run.

Also reset PR statuses to pending it rests are rerun.
title: added run das queries test for PRs; reset statues on rerun
